title: Errors when building graphviz
body:
Hi,

I am trying to install graphviz with the command:

spack install graphviz@2.38.0+libgd+pangocairo ^cairo@1.14.8+X ^libgd@2.2.4 ^pango@1.40.3+X ^gettext@0.19.8.1+bzip2+curses+git+libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz ^glib@2.49.7+libmount ^python@2.7.13+tk ^libpthread-stubs@0.3 ^xproto@7.0.29 ^libx11@1.6.3 ^util-linux@2.29.1 ^expat@2.2.0 ^freetype@2.7 ^ghostscript@9.21 ^libtiff@4.0.6 ^libpng@1.6.27 ^libtool@2.4.6 ^pkg-config@0.29.2 ^fontconfig@2.11.1 %gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64

The build fails and the spack-build.out contains the following errors:

```
Making all in vmalloc
make[3]: Entering directory '/scratch/spackapps/spack-stage/spack-stage-OKE3Sk/graphviz-2.38.0/lib/vmalloc'
mkdir -p ../../FEATURE
/cluster/apps/spack/var/spack/stage/graphviz-2.38.0-ecfr7hcihvxaojf272ujvwpjofv5ywil/graphviz-2.38.0/iffe - set cc /cluster/apps/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc   : run /cluster/apps/spack/var/spack/stage/graphviz-2.38.0-ecfr7hcihvxaojf272ujvwpjofv5ywil/graphviz-2.38.0/lib/vmalloc/features/vmalloc > ../../FEATURE/vmalloc
  CC       malloc.lo
malloc.c:404:15: error: return type is an incomplete type
 struct mstats mstats(void)
               ^
malloc.c: In function 'mstats':
malloc.c:410:19: error: storage size of 'ms' isn't known
     struct mstats ms;
                   ^
malloc.c:421:5: warning: 'return' with a value, in function returning void [enabled by default]
     return ms;
     ^
malloc.c:410:19: warning: unused variable 'ms' [-Wunused-variable]
     struct mstats ms;
                   ^
Makefile:581: recipe for target 'malloc.lo' failed
make[3]: *** [malloc.lo] Error 1
make[3]: Leaving directory '/scratch/spackapps/spack-stage/spack-stage-OKE3Sk/graphviz-2.38.0/lib/vmalloc'
Makefile:536: recipe for target 'all-recursive' failed
make[2]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[2]: Leaving directory '/scratch/spackapps/spack-stage/spack-stage-OKE3Sk/graphviz-2.38.0/lib'
Makefile:774: recipe for target 'all-recursive' failed
make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[1]: Leaving directory '/scratch/spackapps/spack-stage/spack-stage-OKE3Sk/graphviz-2.38.0'
Makefile:583: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2
[spackapps@lo-a2-015 scripts]$
```

Does anybody get the same errors when installing graphviz ?
